attributes.action: not spend taxpayer money on a Papal visit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgraceful that the British taxpayer should foot the bill for the proposed Papal visit. Pope Benedict repeatedly espouses irresponsible notions in direct conflict with the progressive efforts and values of the British people.  

Tenets such as “abortion is a crime”, “humanity needs saving from homosexuality” and “condoms aggravate the HIV/AIDS epidemic” would not have gotten this government elected and therefore it is immoral to spend your voters' hard-earned tax money in this way.
